column4: how do i change file associations in ubuntu. When I download a torrent with Firefox I want "Open With" to have Deluge in it instead of the default bittorrent protocol
right click the torrent file, select properties, and in the dialog window select open with tab. Move the radio button
would be nice if there was a central place to change them all, though
vmware doesnt support direct rendering so that doesnt work for gaming
